title.narrative: Diagnosed cases treated in the designated treatment centers per approved protocol
Designated acute healthcare facilities with isolation capacity
COVID-19 Compensation Benefit Framework developed and implemented
Simulation exercises and scenarios conducted in facilities and communities marked as DSS sites and quarantine facilities
Designated facilities for COVID-19 received monitoring and supportive supervision in preceding quarter
Confirmed COVID-19 cases that conducted contact tracing
Country adopted personal and community non-pharmaceutical interventions
Designated laboratories with COVID-19 diagnostic equipment, test kits and reagents
Designated laboratories diagnosed suspected COVID-19 cases within 24 hrs
Referral system to care for COVID-19 patients prepared
Complaints resolved within one week of having received them
Individuals reached with tailored information on COVID-19
M&E system established and implemented to monitor project progress
